div.p: Family background was to all intents and purposes from the outside looked perfect. Now I look back they did their best, they over-protected me
so they under the guise of... and they did it in a loving way it was the only way they knew how to do it but I think it was
over-protective and it sheltered me from things I should have probably learned and developed but we had great holidays and
we went away and everything was fine. Probably, wrongly, my family background has altered, I did things for a pleasing reason probably
rather than the right reason and I did things that were probably easier than I should have maybe taken a different path
and done... and stuck my neck out there and done something for me so Iâ€™ve tended to toe the family line I suppose,
unfortunately, rather than go it alone and risk failure I suppose.
